column5: I would like more info about snowbird and how to get there.I have a friend that guided there years ago.He told me great stories about this place.So i'm kind of interested a little more on who flys in there and costs,i did look on a map of the lake looks like there is a few cabins there.percher maybe you could tell me more.I asked my friend but he never gets around to it and it was many years ago for him.
I think Kasba Lake Lodge has fly in's to the lake. 800-663-8641
